channel.title: Can someone help me?
channel.description: Hey, so im using DeathlyPvpz for me and my friends, and i think i did everything correctly, But he cant connect, he gets to the login screen and it says error connecting to server :/

item.title: Can someone help me?
item.dc:creator: @noah1gamble noah1gamble
item.description:
@noah1gamble wrote:

[quote=“Tutorial, post:2, topic:508834”]You most likely have the one or more of the following problems:

[ul][li]The port you are using isn’t forwarded[/li]
[li]The client is trying to connect to the wrong IP or port[/li]
[li]The server port and client port don’t match (but if you can connect this isn’t the problem)[/li][/ul]

If you don’t know how to portforward, try www.portforward.com. Other than the above issues, there really aren’t any other problems that could prevent your friend from connecting to you.[/quote]
No. i am correctly portforwarded, He has been able to connect on my other server.
And i can connect, And im 99.9% sure i have the ip in correctly.

Read full topic

item.title: Can someone help me?
item.dc:creator: @Tutorial Tutorial
item.description:
@Tutorial wrote:

You most likely have the one or more of the following problems:

[ul][li]The port you are using isn’t forwarded[/li]
[li]The client is trying to connect to the wrong IP or port[/li]
[li]The server port and client port don’t match (but if you can connect this isn’t the problem)[/li][/ul]

If you don’t know how to portforward, try www.portforward.com. Other than the above issues, there really aren’t any other problems that could prevent your friend from connecting to you.

Read full topic
